languages.text: Everyone in a 4-cell radius around the psyker is {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g} back by <u>(1 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} / 2)</u> cells.
languages.original_text: Всех в радиусе 4 клеток от псайкера {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}отталкивает{/g} назад на <u>(1 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} / 2)</u> клеток.

traits.locale_text: Everyone in a 4-cell radius around the psyker is pushed back by <u>(1 + psy rating / 2)</u> cells.

languages.text: 灵能者周围4格内所有生物都会被{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}击退{/g}，格数等同于<u>（1+{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}/2）</u>。

traits.locale_text: 灵能者周围4格内所有生物都会被击退，格数等同于<u>（1+{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}/2）</u>。

languages.text: Todos los que se encuentren en un radio de 4 casillas alrededor del psíquico se ven {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}empujados{/g} <u>(1 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} / 2)</u> casillas.
languages.original_text: Everyone in a 4-cell radius around the psyker is {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g} back by <u>(1 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} / 2)</u> cells.

traits.locale_text: Todos los que se encuentren en un radio de 4 casillas alrededor del psíquico se ven empujados <u>(1 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} / 2)</u> casillas.

languages.text: 異能者の周囲4セル以内の全員が<u>(1 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g} / 2)</u>セル{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}後退{/g}する。

languages.text: Alle innerhalb einen 4-Felder-Radius um den Psioniker werden um <u>(1 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} / 2)</u> Felder {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}zurückgeworfen{/g}.

languages.text: Tous les personnages présents dans un rayon de 4 cases autour du psyker sont {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}repoussés{/g} de <u>(1 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} / 2)</u> cases.

languages.text: Ruhsezerin en fazla 4 hücre uzağında bulunan herkes, <u>(1 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}ruhsezi derecesi{/g} / 2)</u> kadar hücre geriye doğru {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}itilir{/g}.
